text: Dhalavaipuram is a panchayat town in Virudhunagar district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. ==Demographics== India census, Dhalavaipuram had a population of 5371. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Dhalavaipuram has an average literacy rate of 71%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 78% and, female literacy is 65%. In Dhalavaipuram, 11% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Virudhunagar district
title: Dhalavoipuram
